article: In today's world, pollution has become a serious problem.  _  we know, air pollution is harmful to our health. However, not all people know that noise  _  also a kind of pollution and is harmful to human health. People who work and live in noisy conditions may become  _  . For example, many of the workers who  _  newspapers and books become deaf. Quite a few people living near  _  also have hearing lose. Recently it was reported that many teenagers in America  _  hear better than the old do, because these young people always listen to  _  pop music. Making a loud noise in public is also a kind of pollution, it not only  _  others but also does great harm to hearing. Cars and machines also produce  lots of  noise. It makes people feel uncomfortable and unpleasant.  What's more  it can cause them to be sick or deaf.Nowadays many countries are trying to solve all sorts of environmental problems, including noise pollution.
